snippet.title: A Hero's Rest: An RPG Town Simulator - V1.0 Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Buy now on Steam or The EpicGames Store:
Steam Page: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2016080/A_Heros_Rest/
EpicGames Store: https://store.epicgames.com/en-US/p/a-heros-rest-67f117

Build shops, craft items with hundreds of customization options, and manage your resources wisely to lead your Heroes to success. Immerse yourself as proprietor of a medieval fantasy town in a world abounding with Heroes and Monsters.

Patch V1.0 - Patch notes:
https://store.steampowered.com/news/app/2016080/view/4534653721985578133?l=english
------------------------------------------------------------------------
For More information on "A Hero's Rest: An RPG Town Simulator" Follow us on our social networks:
